tasks.label: rebuild-spid-proxy-quiet
tasks.command: docker compose build --quiet spid-proxy; docker compose up -d --force-recreate spid-proxy

tasks.label: generate-spid-metadata-next
tasks.command: docker compose build --quiet spid-proxy; docker compose --profile spid-proxy-metadata run --rm spid-proxy-metadata

tasks.label: generate-spid-metadata-force
tasks.command: docker compose build --quiet spid-proxy; docker compose --profile spid-proxy-metadata run --rm -e SPID_PROXY_PUBLIC_BASE_URL=https://login.ente.it -e SPID_PROXY_FORCE_REGEN_SETUP=1 -e SPID_PROXY_ADD_CIE=1 spid-proxy-metadata

tasks.label: logs
tasks.command: docker run --rm -v "${PWD}/spid-proxy/metadata:/w" -w /w govpay-spid-proxy:latest bash -lc "set -euo pipefail; cert_b64=$(sed -n 's:.*<ds:X509Certificate>\(.*\)</ds:X509Certificate>.*:\1:p' cie-metadata-next.xml | head -n 1); echo '-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----' > cie-cert.pem; echo \"${cert_b64}\" | fold -w 64 >> cie-cert.pem; echo '-----END CERTIFICATE-----' >> cie-cert.pem; echo '--- subject/issuer/dates ---'; openssl x509 -in cie-cert.pem -noout -subject -issuer -dates; echo '--- subject dump (URI OID 2.5.4.83) ---'; openssl x509 -in cie-cert.pem -noout -text | grep -E 'Subject:|2\.5\.4\.83|URI' || true"

tasks.label: inspect-cie-cert-from-metadata-2
tasks.command: docker run --rm -v "${PWD}/spid-proxy/metadata:/w" -w /w govpay-spid-proxy:latest bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; cert_b64=$(sed -n "s:.*<ds:X509Certificate>\\(.*\\)</ds:X509Certificate>.*:\\1:p" cie-metadata-next.xml | head -n 1); echo "-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----" > cie-cert.pem; echo "${cert_b64}" | fold -w 64 >> cie-cert.pem; echo "-----END CERTIFICATE-----" >> cie-cert.pem; echo "--- subject/issuer/dates ---"; openssl x509 -in cie-cert.pem -noout -subject -issuer -dates; echo "--- subject dump (URI OID 2.5.4.83) ---"; openssl x509 -in cie-cert.pem -noout -text | grep -E "Subject:|2\\.5\\.4\\.83|URI"; true'
